member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_COPY_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies what type of texture copy is to take place.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_COPY_TYPE.D3D12_TEXTURE_COPY_TYPE_SUBRESOURCE_INDEX
member.summary: Indicates a subresource, identified by an index, is to be copied.

member.name: D3D12_TEXTURE_COPY_TYPE.D3D12_TEXTURE_COPY_TYPE_PLACED_FOOTPRINT
member.summary: Indicates a place footprint, identified by a structure, is to be copied.
